docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY, June 24 With the general agreement that the Legislature is not prepared to make any major revisions in the state's rent laws this year, the battleground over a measure to merely extend the soon-to-expire current law has shifted to the transparently political question of whether to extend it for one year or two.

headline.main: Extension of Rent Laws Stirs Albany Fight Over How Long
